name: Example RAG Test Dataset
description: Sample test cases for RAG evaluation with /rag-eval

test_cases.query: What is the return policy for electronics?
test_cases.expected_answer: Electronics can be returned within 30 days with original receipt and packaging. Items must be in working condition.

test_cases.query: How do I track my order?
test_cases.expected_answer: You can track your order using the tracking link in your confirmation email, or by logging into your account and viewing order history.

test_cases.query: Can I return an item without a receipt?
test_cases.expected_answer: Items can be returned without a receipt for store credit only. Valid ID is required. Electronics and high-value items cannot be returned without proof of purchase.

test_cases.query: What happens if my order is damaged during shipping?
test_cases.expected_answer: Contact customer service within 48 hours of delivery with photos of the damage. We will arrange a replacement or full refund including shipping costs.

test_cases.query: Compare the warranty coverage for laptops vs tablets
test_cases.expected_answer: Laptops come with a 2-year manufacturer warranty covering hardware defects. Tablets have a 1-year warranty. Extended warranties are available for both at checkout.
